attributes.action: Stop the extradition of Gary McKinnon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Gary Mckinnon is a British citizen who should be tried here, not in a foreign country like America. To extradite him there would be a travesty of justice, and void the definition of a British Citizen.
Support justice. Support Gary Mckinnon.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
